description:
It’s a limited-time offer, so don’t miss out! Join your family, get your Tanuki token to the center of the board and save the day. 
 
What’s more, get 2 Maps with JUMANJI: The Curse Returns including Brantford and the Winter Resort.
 
Play your way around a map of nostalgic locations in Brantford, from the Parrish Mansion Attic to the Shoe Company.
 
Travel beyond Brantford! Watch out, the magic of Jumanji will never freeze in the icy valley of the Winter Resort Map. Gather a team, face a new danger, and explore a festive Winter wonderland!
name: Pre-Order to Unlock your FREE Tanuki Token!
